content: I think I'll prioritize a few mazes and save the rest for another visit. I've heard that the Pumpkin Eater maze is a must-try, so I'll definitely make time for that one. I'm also curious about The Depths, the new maze that takes you through an underwater abandoned research facility. And of course, I want to ride my favorite coaster, Twisted Colossus, again in the dark - it's always more thrilling at night!
